text: Thomas Charles Sanders ("Tom Conway", September 15, 1904 â€“ April 22, 1967) was an English movie, television, voice, stage, and radio actor. He was known for his roles in 101 Dalmatians, Peter Pan, Cat People, I Walked with a Zombie, and in The Seventh Victim. He was the older brother of actor George Sanders.Obituary Variety, 26 April 1967. Conway was born on September 15, 1904 in St. Petersburg, Russia to English parents. He was raised in Bringhton, England, and studied at Brighton College. He was married to Lillian Eggers from 1941 until they divorced in 1953. Then he was married to Queenie Leonard from 1958 until they divorced in 1963. Conway had no children. Conway died on April 22, 1967 in Culver City, California from cirrhosis of the liver, aged 62. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1904 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:English stage actors Category:English radio actors
